name: I Am Not Alone
description:
They were always here.

I Am Not Alone is an experimental inquisition experience which requires deliberation and ingenuity to complete. The dark halls and barren rooms of the house offer them no guidance, they must save themselves using nothing but their own mettle. But something is different now, something is wrong. This is not right.

Use the arrow keys to guide them.

Use the E key to interact with light switches and other things.

If you enjoy this experience be sure to rate it, recommend it to your acquaintances or; leave a comment on what you appreciated along with any suggestions you may have for improvements.  Without this support it is very difficult for games to gain any kind of public attention.
